articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Mike Hussey picks out two senior India duo as key for WTC Final success - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Australia great Mike Hussey believes the experience of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma will be crucial to India's chances at next month's ICC World Test Championship final in London.
articles.content: Australia great Mike Hussey believes the experience of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma will be crucial to India's chances at next month's ICC World Test Championship final in London.Hussey was well-reno… [+2451 chars]
